Title: Relates to prohibiting the location of wind turbines on Lake Erie
Summary: Prohibits the location and construction of wind turbines on Lake Erie.
LawCode: Amd ยง168, Pub Serv L; amd ยง15-0503, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law and the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the location of wind turbines on Lake Erie
